gameDetails.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple â€“ Queenie 14: Wishing Well
gameDetails.description:
Originally offered through Dice Tower's Season 13 Indiegogo campaign

This is Queenie 14

Setup:
After you have placed 2 randomly drawn chamber tiles next to the starting tile, shuffle the new chamber with the rest of the chambers.

Rules:
Once discovered, a player inside the wishing well chamber can roll 2 key symbols to draw one treasure tile, get rid of a curse he has in front of him, or reclaim a die he has lost. To use the wishing well again, the player has to leave the chamber and re-enter it
